scripts.install: concurrently "npm run install:host" "npm run install:home" "npm run install:profile" "npm run install:sample"
scripts.install:home: cd remotes; cd home; npm install
scripts.install:sample: cd remotes; cd sample; npm install
scripts.install:profile: cd remotes; cd profile; npm install
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:home" "npm run start:sample" "npm run start:profile" "npm run start:host"
scripts.start:home: cd remotes && cd home && npm start
scripts.start:sample: cd remotes && cd sample && npm start
scripts.start:profile: cd remotes && cd profile && npm start
scripts.build:home: cd remotes && cd home && npm run build
scripts.build:sample: cd remotes && cd sample && npm run build
scripts.build:profile: cd remotes && cd profile && npm run build
scripts.build:remote: cd remotes && cd $npm_config_name && npm run build
